item.title: Dow Rebounds But Still on Course for Worst Week Since March 2023
item.description: Stocks came roaring back, but the gains won’t prevent major U.S. indexes from ending the week lower.

item.title: Gold Rises After Fed's Go-to Inflation Measure Was Lighter Than Expected
